verses.verse: Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you God <S%H410><s%> to whom vengeance <S%H5360><s%> belongs, <S%H410><s%> you God to whom vengeance <S%H5360><s%> belongs, <S%H3313><s%> shine forth.
Rise up, <S%H5375><s%> you judge <S%H8199><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%> Pay <S%H7725><s%> back the proud <S%H1343><s%> what they deserve. <S%H1576><s%>
Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> how long will the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> how long will the wicked <S%H7563><s%> triumph? <S%H5937><s%>
They pour <S%H5042><s%> out arrogant <S%H6277><s%> words. <S%H1696><s%> All the evildoers <S%H205><s%> <S%H6466><s%> boast. <S%H559><s%>
They break your people <S%H5971><s%> in pieces, <S%H1792><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and afflict <S%H6031><s%> your heritage. <S%H5159><s%>
They kill <S%H2026><s%> the widow <S%H490><s%> and the alien, <S%H1616><s%> and murder <S%H7523><s%> the fatherless. <S%H3490><s%>
They say, <S%H559><s%> "Yah <S%H3050><s%> will not see, <S%H7200><s%> neither will Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s God <S%H430><s%> consider. <S%H995><s%>"
Consider, <S%H995><s%> you senseless <S%H1197><s%> among the people; <S%H5971><s%> you fools, <S%H3684><s%> when will you be wise? <S%H7919><s%>
He who implanted <S%H5193><s%> the ear, <S%H241><s%> won't <S%H8085><s%> he hear? He who formed <S%H3335><s%> the eye, <S%H5869><s%> won't <S%H5027><s%> he see?
He who disciplines <S%H3256><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> won't <S%H3198><s%> he punish? He who teaches <S%H3925><s%> man <S%H120><s%> knows. <S%H1847><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> the thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> that they are futile. <S%H1892><s%>
Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H1397><s%> whom you discipline, <S%H3256><s%> Yah, <S%H3050><s%> and teach <S%H3925><s%> out of your law; <S%H8451><s%>
that you may give him rest <S%H8252><s%> from the days <S%H3117><s%> of adversity, <S%H7451><s%> until the pit <S%H7845><s%> is dug <S%H3738><s%> for the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> won't <S%H5203><s%> reject his people, <S%H5971><s%> neither will he forsake <S%H5800><s%> his inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
For judgment <S%H4941><s%> will return <S%H7725><s%> to righteousness. <S%H6664><s%> All the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> shall follow it. <S%H310><s%>
Who will rise up <S%H6965><s%> for me against the wicked? <S%H7489><s%> Who will stand up <S%H3320><s%> for me against the <S%H6466><s%> evildoers? <S%H205><s%>
Unless <S%H3884><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had been my help, <S%H5833><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> would have soon <S%H4592><s%> lived <S%H7931><s%> in silence. <S%H1745><s%>
When I said, <S%H559><s%> "My foot <S%H7272><s%> is slipping! <S%H4131><s%>" Your loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> held me up. <S%H5582><s%>
In the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of my thoughts <S%H8312><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> me, <S%H8575><s%> your comforts delight <S%H8173><s%> my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
Shall the throne <S%H3678><s%> of wickedness <S%H1942><s%> have fellowship <S%H2266><s%> with you, <S%H3335><s%> which brings about mischief <S%H5999><s%> by statute? <S%H2706><s%>
They gather themselves together <S%H1413><s%> against the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> and condemn <S%H7561><s%> the innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood. <S%H1818><s%>
But Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has been my high tower, <S%H4869><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> the rock <S%H6697><s%> of my refuge. <S%H4268><s%>

He has brought <S%H7725><s%> on them their own iniquity, <S%H205><s%> and will cut them off <S%H6789><s%> in their own wickedness. <S%H7451><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> will cut them off. <S%H6789><s%>
